plot: Ridge tries to persuade Caroline to join Forrester Creations instead of Spencer Publications. Kristen informs Clarke that Eric is producing her and his designs. She also explains to Clarke that she believes in their relationship and will fight the other woman to keep him. Rocco joins the Logans at the hospital to greet Beth as she wakes up from surgery. Everyone is optimistic - except for Beth. She weeps over her lost breast and says that she does not want to see Eric again. Stephanie is crushed about Liz Henderson's true identity but still wants to fight for her marriage.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
